segments.text: I observe the kitchen with its open window letting in daylight.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman at the sink dries a plate, completely engrossed.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the water's overflowing— what a wasteful, sloppy situation!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's flooding the counter and floor, drenching everything in sight.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She stands there ignorant, letting the mess accumulate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes stack up nearby, probably next to get ruined.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now the kids: boy's on a rickety stool, fishing for cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That thing could collapse any moment—dangerous parenting oversight!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl eggs him on, reaching for her share greedily.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Sneaking cookies like that, teaching bad habits early.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The tidy garden outside mocks the indoor disorder.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole setup is infuriating, with hazards everywhere ignored.
segments.speaker: PAR
